original_text: In the third year that Jehoshaphat ruled Judah as king, he sent his officers to teach people in all Judah's towns. The names of those officers were Ben-Hail, Obadiah, Zechariah, Nethanel and Micaiah.
korean_text: 그가 왕위에 있은 지 삼 년에 그의 방백들 벤하일과 오바댜와 스가랴와 느다넬과 미가야를 보내어 유다 여러 성읍에 가서 가르치게 하고

sentences.original_text: In the third year that Jehoshaphat ruled Judah as king
sentences.korean_translation: 여호사밧이 유다를 다스린 지 삼 년째 되는 해에

sentences.original_text: to teach people in all Judah's towns
sentences.korean_translation: 유다 모든 성읍의 백성들을 가르치기 위해

sentences.original_text: The names of those officers were
Ben-Hail, Obadiah, Zechariah, Nethanel and Micaiah
